content.raw:
Thank you for the PR!

All these notes are already described on the [Gzweb installation](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=gzweb_install&cat=gzweb) tutorial. I think it would be good to reduce duplication, so we only need to update the information in one place.

Instead of adding these instructions here, how about linking to the other tutorial on the top?

I'll decline this pull request now because we're migrating this repository to GitHub. But please feel free to open a follow up pull request there once we're migrated.
content.html:
Thank you for the PR!

All these notes are already described on the Gzweb installation tutorial. I think it would be good to reduce duplication, so we only need to update the information in one place.

Instead of adding these instructions here, how about linking to the other tutorial on the top?

I'll decline this pull request now because we're migrating this repository to GitHub. But please feel free to open a follow up pull request there once we're migrated.
